title: Sea bass with five spice & tangy tomato sauce

ingredients.item: 150g Waitrose & Partners Pome Dei Moro Tomatoes, cut into thin wedges

instructions.step: Put the onion, tomato paste, five spice, vinegar and honey in a small saucepan; bring to the boil, then take off the heat.

Pat the fish dry on kitchen paper and score the skin several times, then season. Heat the oil in a frying pan. Once very hot, add the fish, skin-side down, and fry for 3-4 minutes until crisp. Turn the fillets and cook for a further 1 minute.

Heat the noodles according to pack instructions. Add the tomatoes and the onion mixture to the pan with the fish and heat through for 1 minute. Transfer the noodles and fish to serving plates and spoon over the tomatoes and juices.
